predicate.note: Frames file for 'cohere' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Compatibility.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Unfortunately, Mr. Bork failed to distinguish between such pressures and the emergence of great issues critical to a society that must be settled judicially if it is [*-4] to cohere.

example.name: predicted but downright weird
example.text: John cohered the chapters of his dissertation.
